tr.td: 12. PATIENT'S OR AUTHORIZED PERSON'S SIGNATURE I authorize the release of any medical or other information necessary to process this claim. I also request payment of government benefits either to myself or to the party who accepts assignment bellow.
13. INSURED'S OR AUTHORIZED PERSON'S SIGNATURE I authorize payment of medical benefits to the undersigned physician or supplier for services described bellow.
14. DATE OF CURRENT ILLNESS, INJURY, or PREGNANCY (LMP)

21. DIAGNOSIS OR NATURE OF ILLNESS OR INJURY Related A-L to service line bellow (24E)
